text: I hope that some day most of the issues with connecting to servers and downloading things will be sorted out. The first step was using libcurl everywhere, so at least we do the same thing everywhere. But now there’s the long process of stomping out problems that various people have

text: Corporate proxies and SSL interception are the worst.
